strings.title: Dodge Them All!
strings.instructions1: DRAG or ARROW KEYS to move

fields.name: Game Title
fields.description: The title that is displayed in the start menu

fields.name: Font Family
fields.description: Google fonts link to font to use in the game

fields.name: Play Button Text
fields.description: Label on the Play Button

fields.name: Score Text
fields.description: Default: 'Score:'

fields.name: High Score Text
fields.description: Default: 'High Score:'

fields.name: High Score Gained Text
fields.description: When you get a new high score

fields.name: Life Text
fields.description: When you collect a life

fields.name: Shield Text
fields.description: When you collect a shield

fields.name: Starting Lives
fields.description: How many lives you initially have

fields.name: Max Lives
fields.description: How many lives you can have max

fields.name: Enemy Spawn Frequency
fields.description: How often enemies will spawn (Integer)

fields.name: Fast Enemy Spawn Frequency
fields.description: How often fast enemies will spawn (Integer)

fields.name: Life Spawn Frequency
fields.description: How often life collectibles will spawn (Integer)

fields.name: Shield Spawn Frequency
fields.description: How often shield collectibles will spawn (Integer)

fields.name: Enemy Average Speed
fields.description: How fast enemies will move on average (Integer)

fields.name: Draw Background Stars
fields.description: Whether to draw moving stars in the background

fields.name: Star Count
fields.description: How many stars to draw in the background, if enabled (Integer)

fields.name: Score Gain
fields.description: How many points you get after each enemy passes through the bottom (Integer)

fields.name: Score Modifier For Destroyed Enemies
fields.description: How much the base score gain is multiplied after destroying an enemy with a shield (Integer)

fields.name: Shield Duration
fields.description: How long the shield lasts in MILISECONDS (Integer)
